title: @gzip_page breaks raw response view
author: otonoton
body_preview: When a response is provided and the view uses the @gzip_page decorator, even if GZipMiddleware appears *before* silk (as suggested by bug#43), the raw view at `/silk/request/<uuid>/raw/?typ=response&subtyp=raw` will only show the binary gzip data.  Perhaps there should be an option to allow decompressing responses that have `Content-Encoding: gzip` or similar?

title: Summary page too slow
author: otonoton
body_preview: Even with only a few thousand records, the summary page times out for me after a couple of minutes.  Surely there is a way to make those `AVG()` queries not take so long?  (Sidenote: is anyone actually monitoring these issues? There haven't been any comments on recent issues for many months now...)
